sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time/> <cooking_instructions>1. Heat vegetable oil in a pot over medium heat. 2. Add yellow curry paste and cook until fragrant. 3. Stir in coconut milk and bring to a simmer. 4. Add sliced chicken thighs and cook until almost done. 5. Add cubed potatoes, sliced carrots, and sliced onion. 6. Simmer until chicken is cooked through and vegetables are tender. 7. Season with fish sauce and brown sugar. 8. Serve hot over cooked jasmine rice.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Thai">8b495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd0</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Moderate">bee0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Chicken Thighs (500g, boneless and skinl</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Thai Yellow Curry</name> <nutrition>Calories: 450, Protein: 25g, Fat: 30g, Carbs: 25g</nutrition> <owned_by/> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Peel and cube potatoes. 2. Peel and slice carrots. 3. Slice onion.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time/> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>f891d71f9795021069a3b6fce053afea</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
